page.title: 07LIFESTYLES A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: On a school day I get up at 8.00 a.m. First,I have a wash,and after I have my breakfast.I usually have toast or cereal.Later I get dressed and go to school.School starts at 9.00 a.m. and finishes at 3.45 p.m..Every morning we study Maths or English.Our break is at 10.40 a.m.,when we sell crisps.After break we do more work.Morning ends at 12.00 noon,when we have dinner.In the afternoon we do different subjects like Art and Craft and History.Once school has finished I go home and have tea.Later,I usually go out with my friends.When I get in,I watch television and go to bed at about 9.45 p.m..
